0.user_question: For the walls of the house he would use 13 large planks of wood. If each plank of wood needs 17 pieces of nails to be secured and in addition 8 nails are needed for some smaller planks. How many nails does John need for the house wall?

ost_step.3: So he needs 13 * 17 = 219 for the large planks alone.
ost_step.4: There are also 8 nails for the smaller planks.
